channel.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
channel.description: This is a topic open to any suggestions you may have for improving the site. Anything regarding the improvement of this site is welcome here, including comments on other people's suggestions.

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:1487, topic:248368”]I board/childboard where you can give away your rs account?[/quote]Like CJ said, there is a topic for it.

There have hardly been any give-aways, no point to making a sub-board.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

TabbyKiller:

A board/childboard where you can give away your rs account?

You can do that in runescape discussion providing that you’re giving it away, and not asking something for it.

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:1485, topic:248368”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=389322.msg3342861#msg3342861 date=1284541882]
I will not give up until we get what we want!

I still think a console gaming board would be a good idea, well since rsps isn’t going anywhere for sometime we need something to keep us company. MITB’s gaming board isn’t enough, remember MPSCP and MITB are no longer one forum, so why can they have a gaming board and we cant?

I will not take no for an answer.
[/quote]

www.moparisthebest.com is related to RuneScape private servers only, if you wish to chat about video games either use the MoparScape general discussion board, as it fits into that category nicely, or else go over to www.moparisthebest.com . Those are your options.[/quote]In other words:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:1466, topic:248368”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=389322.msg3337616#msg3337616 date=1284076970]
Well a lot of the people here either play PS3 or Xbox 360 so maybe we could have a board/section for console gaming? I’d really like that, what about everyone else?
[/quote]I disagree.
2) This site is for RSPS and things related to it (RuneScape, Programming etc), and things like consoles could be posted on MITB[/quote]

Read full topic

I still think a console gaming board would be a good idea, well since rsps isn’t going anywhere for sometime we need something to keep us company. MITB’s gaming board isn’t enough, remember MPSCP and MITB are no longer one forum, so why can they have a gaming board and we cant?

I will not take no for an answer.[/quote]

www.moparisthebest.com is related to RuneScape private servers only, if you wish to chat about video games either use the MoparScape general discussion board, as it fits into that category nicely, or else go over to www.moparisthebest.com . Those are your options.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:1481, topic:248368”]Also, for server development blogs. I think it should be a requirement to post snippets of code THEY wrote themselves. Doesn’t have to be the whole thing, but a “sneak peak” of the code. That way we know they’re actually developing something on their own. It would also present an opportunity for other programmers give out a little constructive criticism on the developers programming.[/quote]I agree!

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

I think extremely strict moderation would be a good wake up call. It will make people think before they post topics.

Also, for server development blogs. I think it should be a requirement to post snippets of code THEY wrote themselves. Doesn’t have to be the whole thing, but a “sneak peak” of the code. That way we know they’re actually developing something on their own. It would also present an opportunity for other programmers give out a little constructive criticism on the developers programming.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:1476, topic:248368”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=389322.msg3338181#msg3338181 date=1284140518]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=389322.msg3338178#msg3338178 date=1284140352]There were tons of RS and GP threads in the general section before there was a section for them.

That’s because this is a Runescape private server website…most people, if not, everyone will have played or still plays runescape. Not everyone here plays PC/Xbox/PS3/other console games.
[/quote]Which supports my claims…
[/quote]

A new section (With the subjects posted in it that I specified in my above post) will encourage others to “game” more; it could help people find the right game/console/computer components to optimize their gaming experience.[/quote]We don’t need a new section for that

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Everything in three threads. Easy peasy.

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:1475, topic:248368”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=389322.msg3338180#msg3338180 date=1284140464]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=389322.msg3338178#msg3338178 date=1284140352]There were tons of RS and GP threads in the general section before there was a section for them.
[/quote]

That’s because this is a Runescape private server website…most people, if not, everyone will have played or still plays runescape. Not everyone here plays PC/Xbox/PS3/other console games.
[/quote]Which supports my claims…[/quote]

A new section (With the subjects posted in it that I specified in my above post) will encourage others to “game” more; it could help people find the right game/console/computer components to optimize their gaming experience.

item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Davidi2:

There were tons of RS and GP threads in the general section before there was a section for them.

That’s because this is a Runescape private server website…most people, if not, everyone will have played or still plays runescape. Not everyone here plays PC/Xbox/PS3/other console games.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:1472, topic:248368”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=389322.msg3338109#msg3338109 date=1284134893]

[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=389322.msg3338015#msg3338015 date=1284125137]

Well a lot of the people here either play PS3 or Xbox 360 so maybe we could have a board/section for console gaming? I’d really like that, what about everyone else?
[/quote]I disagree.

  1. We don’t have enough content of console gaming worth making a new board for it
  2. This site is for RSPS and things related to it (RuneScape, Programming etc), and things like consoles could be posted on MITB
  3. We have a general discussion board, which can accommodate all of the console gaming threads (of which there is a total of what, like 5?)
  1. Console gaming isn’t only PS3 and XBox 360, so you’re wrong there.
  2. That is an invalid argument; an RSPS site does not have to be 100% related to RSPS, so you’re wrong there.
  3. As I said, there are more than 2 gaming consoles, if you knew that, so there will be more than ‘5’ threads, so you’re wrong there again.

@Tabby: I agree also.
[/quote]1) I meant at the moment, how many gaming threads are there? (No matter the console)
2) This site is for RSPS, MITB is for most other general information (hence cars, other languages, graphics etc)
3) Read #1. The reason the GP and RD boards were made was because there were a lot of threads pertaining to them, clogging up general discussion. And I personally have over 4 consoles, so I know there are more than 2. (And I never even mentioned 2, so I don’t know where you came up with that)

@Prima, your pro’s could be one thread each. ‘Post game links here’ ‘Post game downloads here’ ‘Game reviews’

There aren’t many at the moment because there isn’t a section for them…[/quote]There were tons of RS and GP threads in the general section before there was a section for them.

Read full topic

2) This site is for RSPS, MITB is for most other general information (hence cars, other languages, graphics etc)
3) Read #1. The reason the GP and RD boards were made was because there were a lot of threads pertaining to them, clogging up general discussion. And I personally have over 4 consoles, so I know there are more than 2. (And I never even mentioned 2, so I don’t know where you came up with that)

@Prima, your pro’s could be one thread each. ‘Post game links here’ ‘Post game downloads here’ ‘Game reviews’[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:1467, topic:248368”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=389322.msg3337834#msg3337834 date=1284097308]

Well a lot of the people here either play PS3 or Xbox 360 so maybe we could have a board/section for console gaming? I’d really like that, what about everyone else?
[/quote]I disagree.

  1. We don’t have enough content of console gaming worth making a new board for it
  2. This site is for RSPS and things related to it (RuneScape, Programming etc), and things like consoles could be posted on MITB
  3. We have a general discussion board, which can accommodate all of the console gaming threads (of which there is a total of what, like 5?)
  1. Console gaming isn’t only PS3 and XBox 360, so you’re wrong there.
  2. That is an invalid argument; an RSPS site does not have to be 100% related to RSPS, so you’re wrong there.
  3. As I said, there are more than 2 gaming consoles, if you knew that, so there will be more than ‘5’ threads, so you’re wrong there again.

@Tabby: I agree also.[/quote]1) I meant at the moment, how many gaming threads are there? (No matter the console)
2) This site is for RSPS, MITB is for most other general information (hence cars, other languages, graphics etc)
3) Read #1. The reason the GP and RD boards were made was because there were a lot of threads pertaining to them, clogging up general discussion. And I personally have over 4 consoles, so I know there are more than 2. (And I never even mentioned 2, so I don’t know where you came up with that)

@Prima, your pro’s could be one thread each. ‘Post game links here’ ‘Post game downloads here’ ‘Game reviews’

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

I agree with the idea of a gaming board since I play games both on my PC and my Xbox, quite often.

There are both pros and cons to the idea:

Pros:

[ul][li]People who use this forum generally are gamers and have pretty decent PCs.[/li]
[li]Ways of obtaining games can be discussed/made into tutorials (E.g, torrenting, warez etc.).[/li]
[li]Users could post links to decent games to download/buy.[/li]
[li]Several sub-sections could be made, such as reviews, the technical side to gaming and others.[/li]
[li]A gaming board can also introduce a small computing side to it, for the PC gamers, where computing components to help run games faster can be discussed etc (I am aware that there’s a board for this on MITB, however most Moparscapers would most likely be shit upon by the people of the MITB side).[/li][/ul]

Cons:

[ul][li]Posting torrent/warez links is illegal in most countries, therefore there may be legality issues that may crop up with the forum (I doubt anyone cares about this anyway).[/li]
[li]As some of the above people have said, there aren’t many topics about gaming (However there are quite a few topics about individual games that people want opinions on etc).[/li][/ul]

There are probably more, those are just the ones that I can think of.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions! Help improve the site!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:1466, topic:248368”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=389322.msg3337616#msg3337616 date=1284076970]
Well a lot of the people here either play PS3 or Xbox 360 so maybe we could have a board/section for console gaming? I’d really like that, what about everyone else?
[/quote]I disagree.

  1. We don’t have enough content of console gaming worth making a new board for it
  2. This site is for RSPS and things related to it (RuneScape, Programming etc), and things like consoles could be posted on MITB
  3. We have a general discussion board, which can accommodate all of the console gaming threads (of which there is a total of what, like 5?)[/quote]
  4. Console gaming isn’t only PS3 and XBox 360, so you’re wrong there.
  5. That is an invalid argument; an RSPS site does not have to be 100% related to RSPS, so you’re wrong there.
  6. As I said, there are more than 2 gaming consoles, if you knew that, so there will be more than ‘5’ threads, so you’re wrong there again.

@Tabby: I agree also.

Read full topic
